reviews.review_msg: She is my favorite prof in my entire four years of uni! She explains concepts so clearly and makes exams very straightforward! I definitely recommend a class with her. Shes amazing

Dr. Sneddon is a wonderful person, her lectures are clear and well-organized and she's always willing to stop and re-explain concepts when someone asks a question. Some of the content in 342 can be tricky without a background in CMPT, but she makes sure that everyone understands before moving on. I would definitely take more classes with her!
